segments.text: What are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking of maybe taking a drive to the beach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a great idea !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you be interested in joining me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I would love to go with you . When would you be leaving ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought that we could leave around 8
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would give us plenty of time to explore . Did you know that there is a music festival on the beach in Santa Barbara ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was part of my plan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well then , I'll see you on Saturday . Thanks for asking me to go with you .
segments.speaker: S2
